query.prompt:
This text is written in Ancient Greek. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Gender, Case, Number, Person, Tense, Mood, Voice and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 Ἐν μέσῳ τῆς ὁδοῦ τῆς ζωῆς ἡμῶν 9 θὰ πῶ γιὰ τἄλλα πράγματα ποὺ εἶδα ἐκεῖ. 28 Ἔπειτα ἀφού ξεκούρασα λίγο τὸ κουρασμένο σῶμα, 67 Ἀπεκρίθη μοι: «Οὐκ ἄνθρωπος, ἄνθρωπος ἤδη ἐγενόμην,
query.result: |Word|Lemma|Part of Speech|Gender|Case|Number|Person|Tense|Mood|Voice|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| |Ἐν|ἐν|preposition||||||||| |μέσῳ|μέσος|adjective|m.|dative|sg.|||||| |τῆς|ὁ|definite article|f.|genitive|sg.|||||| |ὁδοῦ|ὁδός|noun|f.|genitive|sg.|||||| |τῆς|ὁ|definite article|f.|genitive|sg.|||||| |ζωῆς|ζωή|noun|f.|genitive|sg.|||||| |ἡμῶν|ἡμεῖς|personal pronoun||genitive|pl.|1||||| |θὰ|θέλω|verb||||1|future|indicative|active|| |πῶ|φημί|verb||present|subjunctive|1|||active|| |γιὰ|διά|preposition||||||||| |τἄλλα|τά + ἄλλα|definite article|n.|accusative|pl.|||||contraction| |πράγματα|πρᾶγμα|noun|n.|accusative|pl.|||||| |ποὺ|ὅς, ἥ, ὅ|relative pronoun||nominative|pl.|3||||| |εἶδα|ὁράω|verb||aorist|indicative|1|||active|| |ἐκεῖ|ἐκεῖ|adverb||||||||| |Ἔπειτα|ἔπειτα|adverb||||||||| |ἀφού|ἐπεί|conjunction||||||||| |ξεκούρασα|ξεκουράζω|verb||aorist|indicative|1|||active|| |λίγο|ὀλίγος|adjective|n.|accusative|sg.|||||| |τὸ|ὁ|definite article|n.|accusative|sg.|||||| |κουρασμένο|κουράζω|verb|n.|accusative|sg.||perfect|passive||| |σῶμα|σῶμα|noun|n.|accusative|sg.|||||| |Ἀπεκρίθη|ἀποκρίνομαι|verb||aorist|indicative|3|||middle|| |μοι|ἐγώ|personal pronoun||dative|sg.|1||||| |Οὐκ|οὐ|negative particle||||||||| |ἄνθρωπος|ἄνθρωπος|noun|m.|nominative|sg.|||||| |ἄνθρωπος|ἄνθρωπος|noun|m.|nominative|sg.|||||| |ἤδη|ἤδη|adverb||||||||| |ἐγενόμην|γίγνομαι|verb||aorist|indicative|1|||middle||
